00089                 : myPoint( p ),  myCurrentPos(0), mylower(lower), myupper(upper)

00091         }

00121         void next()
00122         {
00123             if (myPoint.at(myCurrentPos)  < myupper.at(myCurrentPos))
00124                 myPoint.at(myCurrentPos) ++;
00125             else
00126             {
00127                 while ((myCurrentPos < myPoint.dimension()) &&
00128                         (myPoint.at(myCurrentPos)  >=  myupper.at(myCurrentPos)))
00129                 {
00130                     myPoint.at(myCurrentPos) = mylower.at(myCurrentPos);
00131                     myCurrentPos++;
00132                 }
00133 
00134                 if  (myCurrentPos < myPoint.dimension())
00135                 {
00136                     myPoint.at(myCurrentPos) ++;
00137                     myCurrentPos = 0;
00138                 }
00139                 else
00140                 {
00141                     myPoint = myupper;
00142                 }
00143             }
00144         }
00145

00152         {
00153             this->next();
00154             return *this;
00155         }
00156

00162         {
00163             ConstIterator tmp = *this;
00164             ++*this;
00165             return tmp;
00166         }
00167 
00168 
00174         void prev()
00175         {
00176             if ( myPoint.at( myCurrentPos )  > mylower.at( myCurrentPos ) )
00177                 myPoint.at( myCurrentPos ) --;
00178             else
00179             {
00180                 while ((myCurrentPos >= 0) &&
00181                         (myPoint.at(myCurrentPos)  <=  mylower.at(myCurrentPos)))
00182                 {
00183                     myPoint.at(myCurrentPos) = myupper.at(myCurrentPos);
00184                     myCurrentPos++;
00185                 }
00186 
00187                 if  ( myCurrentPos >= 0 )
00188                 {
00189                     myPoint.at(myCurrentPos) --;
00190                     myCurrentPos = 0;
00191                 }
00192                 else
00193                 {
00194                     myPoint = mylower;
00195                 }
00196             }
00197 
00198         }
00199

00206             this->prev();
00207             return *this;
00208         }
